languages.text: "Утверждения истинны. Однако я готов держать ответ перед техно-собратьями. Дальнейшее вмешательство единицы Соломон нежелательно по идеологическим соображениям".
"These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."
languages.original_text: "Утверждения истинны. Однако я готов держать ответ перед техно-собратьями. Дальнейшее вмешательство единицы Соломон нежелательно по идеологическим соображениям".

traits.locale_text: "These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."
"These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."
"These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."
"These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."
"These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."
"These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."

languages.text: “上述说法都是真的，不过即便如此，我也愿意答复这位技术同僚的指控。出于意识形态的相关原因，本单位不希望索罗蒙这一单位继续干涉。”
languages.original_text: "These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."

traits.locale_text: “上述说法都是真的，不过即便如此，我也愿意答复这位技术同僚的指控。出于意识形态的相关原因，本单位不希望索罗蒙这一单位继续干涉。”

languages.text: «Estas declaraciones son verdaderas. Sin embargo, estoy dispuesto a responder a las acusaciones de mis tecnocamaradas. Por motivos ideológicos, la participación de la unidad Solomorne no es deseada».
languages.original_text: "These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."

traits.locale_text: «Estas declaraciones son verdaderas. Sin embargo, estoy dispuesto a responder a las acusaciones de mis tecnocamaradas. Por motivos ideológicos, la participación de la unidad Solomorne no es deseada».

languages.text: « Ces déclarations sont vraies. Cependant, je suis disposé à répondre aux accusations de mon technoconfrère. Pour des raisons idéologiques, toute autre intervention de l'unité Solomorne n'est pas souhaitable. »
languages.original_text: "These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."

traits.locale_text: « Ces déclarations sont vraies. Cependant, je suis disposé à répondre aux accusations de mon technoconfrère. Pour des raisons idéologiques, toute autre intervention de l'unité Solomorne n'est pas souhaitable. »

languages.text: 「これらの発言は事実だ。しかし、私は技術仲間たちからの告発に応じる用意がある。ユニット・ソロモーンによるこれ以上の介入は、思想上の理由により望ましくない」
languages.original_text: "These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."

traits.locale_text: 「これらの発言は事実だ。しかし、私は技術仲間たちからの告発に応じる用意がある。ユニット・ソロモーンによるこれ以上の介入は、思想上の理由により望ましくない」

languages.text: "Bu ifadeler doğru. Ancak tekno yoldaşlarımın suçlamalarını yanıtlamaya hazırım. İdeolojik nedenlerden dolayı Solomorne biriminden daha fazla müdahale istenmiyor."
languages.original_text: "These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ifadeler doğru. Ancak tekno yoldaşlarımın suçlamalarını yanıtlamaya hazırım. İdeolojik nedenlerden dolayı Solomorne biriminden daha fazla müdahale istenmiyor."

languages.text: "Diese Aussagen sind wahr. Dennoch bin ich bereit, auf die Anschuldigungen meines Techkameraden zu antworten. Weiteres Eingreifen durch die Einheit Solomorne ist aus ideologischen Gründen unerwünscht."
languages.original_text: "These statements are true. However, I am prepared to answer my tech-comrades' accusations. Further intervention from the unit Solomorne is undesirable for ideological reasons."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussagen sind wahr. Dennoch bin ich bereit, auf die Anschuldigungen meines Techkameraden zu antworten. Weiteres Eingreifen durch die Einheit Solomorne ist aus ideologischen Gründen unerwünscht."
